metadata.feature_description: Analytics dashboard specifically for the Answers module showing Q&A metrics

steps.action: Login as SuperUser and navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard menu should expand showing submenu items
steps.actual: Dashboard menu expanded successfully showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should load with module tabs including Answers
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel opened but displayed blank white screen. JavaScript error in console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025)

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics from loading: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Answers Tab
steps.expected: Answers tab should display answer-specific metrics including Q&A statistics
steps.actual: Unable to access Answers tab - Community Analytics feature fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics feature completely broken due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Answers Tab and view resolution metrics
steps.expected: Dashboard should show question resolution rate statistics
steps.actual: Unable to access Answers tab - Community Analytics feature fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics feature completely broken due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Answers Tab and view quality metrics
steps.expected: Dashboard should show answer quality statistics
steps.actual: Unable to access Answers tab - Community Analytics feature fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics feature completely broken due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Answers Tab and use time period filter
steps.expected: Time period dropdown should allow filtering by Year, Month, Week, Day, or Custom range
steps.actual: Unable to access time period filter - Community Analytics feature fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics feature completely broken due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate between different module tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions) and verify data isolation
steps.expected: Each module tab should display only data specific to that module
steps.actual: Unable to access module tabs - Community Analytics feature fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics feature completely broken due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

observations: Critical Bug Found: The entire Community Analytics feature fails to load due to a JavaScript error
Error Details: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Root Cause Analysis: The utility object provided to the dashboard module does not include the serializeCustomDate function, which is required during initialization
Impact: All Community Analytics functionality including Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Social Events, Ideas, and Wiki analytics tabs are inaccessible
The Community Analytics menu item is visible and clickable in the PersonaBar Dashboard submenu, but clicking it results in a blank white panel

Code review shows the feature should have module-specific tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Social Events, Ideas, Wiki) with time period filtering, but none of this UI is rendered due to the initialization failure
